# R

## Data Cleaning



Let's start with loading the tidyverse library:

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
category <- c("fruit", "vegetable", "vegetable", "fruit")
type <- c("apple", "brocolli", "cauliflower", "banana")
calories <- c(52.5, 34.2, 25.7, 89.4)

my_tibble <- tibble(category, type, calories)
my_tibble
```
